# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 140 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["title"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsize[0]-4, 60))) self["bgup"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsize[0]-4, 60))) self["bgdown"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsize[0]-4, wsize[1]-66)))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1]+40)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (1080-wsizey)/2))
